summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.4°C) and outside temperature (down 6.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13036 lux) and cloud levels (up 652 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14730 lux) and cloud levels (up 1601 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 651.8m lower than yesterday, 595.1m lower than the past week, 1601.2m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1072.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1667.6m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Changeable conditions.
